comments:
This is a common problem, not DBCS unique. 

I cannot preview a created report and eclipse IDE crashed. 

 Build date: birt-report-framework-N20060321a.zip
(Eclipse IDE: eclipse-SDK-3.2M6-linux-gtk)
 OS: RHEL4 U2 WS ja_JP.UTF8
 Java: J2RE 1.5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Linux x86-32 j9vmxi3223ifx-20060124 (JIT enabled)
 Steps:
        1- Launch Report Project
        2- Create a new report, data source and data set. 
        3- Insert a chart
        4- Click "Preview" tab
       And then, I got the following error at consolelog and could not preview the report.

The same problem occurred with birt-report-framework-N20060330.zip.

Please check the SWT version and plug-in enviroment.
Looks the SWT fails when the code try to access native part.

You may want to check this link http://www.eclipse.org/swt/faq.php#browserlinux

It contains some tips to make sure the embedded browser support will work correctly on Linux.  You may be missing an environment setting.

Added LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib/firefox, the function works correctly. 
Will close.
Steven, thank you for your information.
It might be a good idea to add the URL in comment 3 to the BIRT release notes or readme (which ever you use).  The more places we get this info pasted around eclipse the better.
